creditline: Gift of Ruth and David Waterbury
description: 07-20; vessel that tapers towards both foot and rim with two rims; surface around outer rim carved with irregular curving lines
image_copyright: Copyright © The Estate of Liam Flynn
text: Flynn enjoyed adding visual interest to his vessels, and perfecting the double rim was a key to his success. This inner rim, combined with the deep black that highlights its carved surface patterns, provides an especially mysterious effect. Flynn came from a long line of joiners and woodworkers and opened his own woodturning studio in 1988 at the age of 19.
title: Inner-Rimmed Vessel
